review_data.title: Best Steakhouse in town

review_data.content: I came for just a cappuccino and found a nice space outside. A wise decision because inside it was quite smoky due to the large open grill. They also have a great selection of wines but it was too early in the day to start...More

review_data.title: Lunch outside....
review_data.content: Excellent steaks, huge wine list with a number of rare bottles. Friendly and competent service. Many wines by the glas available. High quality US beef. Nicely designed restaurant.
